name: Lucky Orange
author: Lucky Orange

sections.description:
Get 10 conversion rate optimization tools for the cost of one to help reduce cart abandonment and increase sales. Get started with a free plan and scale up as your business grows. Install with one click.

DYNAMIC HEATMAPS

Want to see the parts of your website that are most popular? A heat map shows where the majority of people clicked, scrolled and moved. Scroll heatmaps show how far down the page people went before leaving and whether they got to your best products or CTAs. Unlike other heat map tools, Lucky Orange’s dynamic heatmaps allow you to study visual engagement patterns including dynamic elements like popups, dropdowns and forms. Lucky Orange heatmaps even work on single page apps (SPAs) and with AJAX.

SESSION RECORDINGS

Watch a replay of people navigating your website to see what’s preventing them from converting. Recordings show where people clicked, scrolled, moved and tapped. See how people interacted with products, what they added to cart and what kept them from buying.

CONVERSION FUNNELS

Set up conversion funnels to quickly see how many people complete each step of your purchase journey. See which pages are converting and which are causing people to leave your site.

VISITOR PROFILES

See everything a specific person does on your website organized in one simple view. Find visitors who meet criteria like traffic source or custom data like cart value to see replays of their visits to your site.

LIVE CHAT

Deliver real-time customer support and use collaboration tools to provide the best response every time. Build lasting relationships by helping people exactly when they need it with event- and time-based triggers.

LIVE VIEW

Live view allows you to see exactly what your customer is experiencing on your website — in real time. Watch live as customers navigate your site for better insight into what’s working and what’s not.

SURVEYS

Ask key questions to the right people and use time-based triggers to engage visitors at the right time with surveys.

ANNOUNCEMENTS

Provide a discount code or product update to all visitors or serve them up to specific visitors by using triggers for criteria like device type, source or visit number.

FORM ANALYTICS

Find out why people are abandoning your forms and fix these issues to reduce abandonment and increase your sales. Monitor key form metrics like abandonment, field order and time to start to find areas for optimization.

OPTIMIZABLE SEGMENTS

Drill down into a single person’s visitor journey to watch session replays of visitor segments you want to prioritize, such as frustrated or confused visitors.

DISCOVERY

Answers the pressing questions about your website visitors through a collection of Optimization Opportunities tied to specific parts of the customer journey. Each of these opportunities represent something you should be paying attention to on your website.
sections.installation: After Activating the plugin simply follow the on-screen instructions.
sections.changelog:
2.1.2

  • Use page variable for site IDs instead of query parameters. This should improve support with caching plugins.

2.1.0

  • Supports loading the correct tracking code for classic customers.

2.0

  • Completely rewritten plugin to support the all new Lucky Orange.
  • Fixes all existing, long-standing issues with previous versions.

1. Dynamic Heatmaps

  2. Session Recordings

  3. Conversion Funnels

  4. Dashboards

  5. Live Chat

  6. Surveys
sections.reviews:
Fantastic service!

By Will Jackson (wj92) on April 8, 2024

I really love Lucky Orange. They offer you a ton of features to analyse your site, have a great, easy to navigate UI and best of all, have one of the best support services I've ever encountered. I think they're priced very fairly too.

Helpful

By kwarning on April 3, 2024

Lucky Orange has been very helpful so far. It has given us a lot of insight already. When we met with the support team, they answered our questions very quickly and added in recommendations to improve our insights!

Very useful for business!

By wpexplorer1023 on December 18, 2023

What a great service! I've been using it for over 2 years now and I can say that this is a MUST have for a store owner. To see what customers are doing on your store? YES, PLEASE!

fine...

By vbaklev on June 3, 2023

ok

need account

By antwal on February 27, 2023

need account

Works as Expected

By Chris McElroy (chrismcelroyseo) on June 24, 2022

It's a lite version of other SEO tools and with a much lighter cost as well.

A useless plugin that does not connect to their service (and worse!)

By essaymentors on December 13, 2021

Long ago I used Lucky Orange on our website and it worked great. A few years ago we canceled the service. In August I reactivated Lucky Orange with the 7-day trial and it worked great. At the end of the week I added my credit card and it stopped working. When I logged into my account, it said the trial had expired. I didn't pay attention and noticed months later that Lucky Orange was billing my account $24/month. "We have no account in that name and don't have a $24 options their customer service people told me. I gave them all of the possible email addresses. It took multiple emails over several weeks before they discovered that, inexplicably, the funds were credited to an account under a former employee's email address, one I'd never logged in with. They reversed the final $24 charge but it took another email for them to refund the full amount they had charged me. (The only good part of this tragic tale.) Now, I can't get the plugin to work. I tried logging on and activating it with my existing account. That didn't work (it kept sending me to Lucky Orange classic). I deleted/reinstalled the plugin and created a new account with a different email address. I copied in the code Lucky Orange gave me, and it didn't work. I contacted customer support. Correction: I tried to contact customer support using the support icon in the dashboard. It did nothing (as another reviewer mentioned). I've deleted my account and am researching alternatives to this disaster of a service.

Installing this plugin brings you back to 2010

By OwlGalaxy (owlgalaxy) on October 9, 2021

The idea was to this your service in conjunction with Wordpress. But the experience from the letgo was so bad that I have decided to look for other options. What's wrong? well everything the plugin is outdated and can't even login, the most important part of the service does not work. to make it even worse all the URLs go to the classic version. This service should help your customers to grow their business but they are loosing all the wordpress users from the start. OK, lets try to "message support" from their own site but the button does absolute nothing. This does not look good and would not recommend this plugin and even discourage it. Save time and look further

Not there yet

By jugglerdesign on August 26, 2021

There was no ability to add a site pre-created within the Lucky Orange site. Also once i installed it it allowed users to see all of my sites. This made it completely useless as I can't allow clients to see other clients data. This plugin has not been thought out at all.

Fantastic for understanding your clients Journey

By tdhandp on September 3, 2016

I wanted to know how my clients were interacting with my site and had to rely on google analytics user flow. Lucky Orange shows you exactly what the user does on your site. Where they scroll to and what they pause on. The closest thing you'll get to a understanding what works and doesn't on your site.

The chat function is invaluable too and has allowed me to connect with people who would have otherwise filled in a contact form.

A bargain at $10 per month.

short_description: Less time crunching numbers, more time growing your business.
